snippet: The former butler, Paolo Gabriele, insisted that his motives had been pure and declared himself innocent of aggravated theft, the charge against him.
abstract: Paolo Gabriele, Pope Benedict XVI’s former butler, admits in testimony to betraying the pope by copying and leaking confidential papal documents, one of the most significant breaches in recent Vatican history; says that his motives were pure and that he is innocent of charges of aggravated theft.
lead_paragraph: The former butler, Paolo Gabriele, insisted that his motives had been pure and declared himself innocent of aggravated theft, the charge against him.
